DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TRADE
DOC.TEXT: Los Angeles Led Nation in Trade , Report Says : Los Angeles had the highest volume of international trade of any U.S. city during the first three quarters of 1994 , surpassing New York . The international trade volume through the U.S. Customs Service ' s Los Angeles district from January through September was valued at $ 106.2 billion , up 21 % from the same period last year , said a study by Claremont McKenna College ' s CMC-Tradeweek Quarterly .
